thread.title: Even celebrities are crying over Adele's new song
thread.title_full: Even celebrities are crying over Adele's new song

title: Even celebrities are crying over Adele's new song
text:
Even celebrities are crying over Adele's new song Video: 'Hello' from Adele 
"Hello" is the latest song from Adele. Her new album, "25," will be released on Nov. 20. 
"Hello" is the latest song from Adele. Her new album, "25," will be released on Nov. 20. Katy Perry 
Adele had these celebrities at hello with the release of her first new song in three years. 
Stars like Katy Perry and Lena Dunham couldn't contain their excitement (or their tears) over this morning's unveiling of "Hello," the first single off Adele's upcoming album, "25." 
Hear that? It's the sound of the Internet quietly weeping. Listen's to "hello" from @OfficialAdele once多多多多 pic.twitter.com/Ni8PGofJOW
